title: 239 - Expert Conversation: David Rudolf & Sonya Pfeiffer
description:
Karen and Georgia chat with defense attorneys David Rudolf and Sonya Pfeiffer about The Staircase documentary and their new podcast, Abuse of Power.

Listen to the Abuse of Power: apple.co/abuseofpower
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
